/* 공통, API Gateway, 이기정 */
SELECT A.API_ID , A.API_NM , A.API_LOC_URLADDR , A.HTT_METHOD_VAL FROM OOM.OOM10210 A WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM OCO.OCO10230 B WHERE B.API_ID = A.API_ID ) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* 공통, API Gateway, 이기정 */
SELECT R.USER_ROLE_ID , R.SCREN_ID , R.BTTN_ID , A.API_ID , A.API_LOC_URLADDR , A.HTT_METHOD_VAL FROM OCO.OCO10121 R INNER JOIN OCO.OCO10230 S ON R.SCREN_ID = S.SCREN_ID AND R.BTTN_ID = S.BTTN_ID INNER JOIN OOM.OOM10210 A ON S.API_ID = A.API_ID WHERE S.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* 공통, API Gateway, 이기정 */
SELECT U.USERID , U.SCREN_ID , U.BTTN_ID , A.API_ID , A.API_LOC_URLADDR , A.HTT_METHOD_VAL FROM OCO.OCO10107 U INNER JOIN OCO.OCO10230 S ON U.SCREN_ID = S.SCREN_ID AND U.BTTN_ID = S.BTTN_ID INNER JOIN OOM.OOM10210 A ON S.API_ID = A.API_ID WHERE S.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
